p: We calculated genetic correlations among traits separately in both temperature treatments using components of covariance and variance estimated, based on sums of cross-products and sums of squares in the analyses of covariance and variance, respectively [ 9]. We included the main effect of family and block as factors in all models. We calculated standard errors of estimated genetic correlations according to [ 43] as well as t-values to assess their statistical significance as the quotient of each genetic correlation and its standard error.
